body_html: Speaking of custom backward, this should be a non-issue. We'll need to add the random ops as non-differentiable in the symbolic AD, but capturing of the mask should happen automatically as part of the derivative for mul.

body: Speaking of custom backward, this should be a non-issue. We'll need to add the random ops as non-differentiable in the symbolic AD, but capturing of the mask should happen automatically as part of the derivative for mul.
